name: Yosemite Sport Climbs And Top Ropes
categories: Yosemite Sport Climbs And Top Ropes
description: More than 200 of the best sport climbs in Yosemite Valley. The climbs range from 30-foot top ropeable routes next to the road to awesome multi-pitch sport climbs. Each of the 25 areas covered gets colour photos, colour topos, and detailed approach information with GPS coordinates. For climbers interested in 5.1 for the first timers to many 5.11 and 5.12 routes for experienced Valley climbers. Included are shady north-facing areas to escape the summer heat and sunny lower-elevation spots that offer perfect conditions all winter long.
